name: PinnedHeaderSliver
info: A sliver that can stay at the top of the viewport, easily achieving a sticky header effect.

nodes.name: PinnedHeaderSliver Official Example
desc: PinnedHeaderSliver can only be used in a scroll viewport, where the child widget will not move out of the viewport when scrolling to the top, thus staying above the viewport.

nodes.name: Sticky Header
desc: The sticky header effect implemented based on PinnedHeaderSliver, note that the divider below also has a sticky effect.

nodes.name: Sticky Header + Search
desc: The sticky header + search box effect implemented based on PinnedHeaderSliver.
